targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "cpu"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1024.0/1024.0/1024.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "path", "mode", "fstype", "device"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "swap_free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1024.0/1024.0/1024.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1024.0/1024.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_unique_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "iops_in_progress")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.host, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.host }))
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")
